sentences.en: For much of the past 15 years, with funding from the European Union, the Italian volcanologist has struggled to focus the scientific community's attention on Nyiragongo.
sentences.cn: 过去十五年大部分时间里，在欧盟的资助下，这位意大利火山学家一直力争让科学界的注意力集中到尼拉贡戈火山。

sentences.en: That volcanologist was busying with memoir after his retirement.
sentences.cn: 自从退休以后,那位火山学家一直忙于撰写回忆录.
